website_summaries.verdict: Wider vinyl slats do a good job of blocking most sunlight, and blinds stay in place with sturdy mounting hardware – but color tends to fade quickly.
pros: Measurements are in line with advertised dimensions
Blinds are relatively easy to hang, and mounting hardware is sturdy metal
Owners find that they block light very effectively
cons: Reports of mismatched colors from slat to slat
Vinyl slats tend to fade after prolonged sun exposure

customer_reviews.title: Decent blinds for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. I was nervous reading the other reviews. I had to return 2 out of 11 for exchange. One was missing the valance and 1 had a slat that was way narrower than the rest, resulting in a strip of light. They do run 1/2" narrower than what they say so plan accordingly. The plastic is nice and thick, not as flimsy as Wal-Mart blinds. I would buy them again, I'd just measure a little differently next time. Good for the price and Amazon was immediate about exchanging for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE, EASY TO HANG
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang and looks awesome on my window. I didn't want to spend a lot of money since I don't plan on staying in this house too long. These blinds were so inexpensive, I was afraid the quality would be terrible, BUT, they turned out to be a great buy! They are light weight, these are not thick, however, they do darken the kitchen. I have them hung in a low traffic area, so I'm not sure how they would hold up with children and dogs interacting with them! Lol! They are located over my kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kai808

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Got them for my kitchen door window/backdoor but i realize they are for inside a framed windows . But they work and they look so much prettier and expensive than the typical 80's office style blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Ktm15

customer_reviews.title: Great & inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Exact size I needed. The brackets come where you can mount on inside of window or above it. It measures perfectly for the inside of our window, but the our ledge was too small. The blinds still look perfect. Total install was about 20 minutes... mostly messing with level and height. Awesome blinds especially for the price! (Excuse the paint... backsplash coming soon!)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Holder

customer_reviews.title: Really finished off our sons new bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: OK, to be honest when our son said he wanted these instead of white blinds I was not a big fan. But it was what he wanted for his new room, so ok. SO glad he talked me into it! I was really impressed by the looks of these. They look much more expensive than they were. The 2-inch width is SO much better then those flimsy 1/2 and 1 inch ones. They seem sturdy enough to hold up to occasional bump ins and roughness of a little boy. They were easy to install and arrived quickly. Completely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: No wood grain
customer_reviews.text: We ordered some of these in brown and white over a year ago. They worked so well that we came back to order some more. Unfortunately, the product is different. Earlier, it looked like real wood from a distance (showing the grain), but the latest shipment looked like the cheap, vinyl blinds.
customer_reviews.author: charisma pancreas

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy blinds
customer_reviews.text: Nice blinds with a wood like finish. The installation was a breeze and I am not a very "Savy" person when it comes to installing things. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of these blinds and would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W.

customer_reviews.title: Just plain lazy!
customer_reviews.text: The blinds were nice enough for the money but that doesn't matter because some of the hardware was missing and the instructions list "several" as the quantity included for some of the hardware. Missing valance supports, missing cord retainers, ten too many screws. It's as if the hardware is all in a bin and someone just throws a handful in. Just plain lazy!
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP! CHEAP! AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Brackets easily bent. Worse, the cross threads upon which the slats balance are not the same space apart on the left and right sides and one is missing about 1/3 of the way up from the bottom, so the loser part hangs unevenly, by about an inch. I rethreaded the lower part of one side and will lose the last slat length in order to make them even. The brackets that hold the bottom are a brittle plastic that probably won't hold up. I'm disappointed, but really kicking myself for forgetting one cardinal shopping rule -"you get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Thirty dollars for junk
customer_reviews.text: These blinds are garbage. The corners were chipped and jagged, and the coloration is off. They are very flimsey and will crack with the slightest pressure. The corner of the vallance was completely snapped off straight out of the box but the master box was in perfect condition. Which tells me it was packed broken wherever they were made. These blinds look like they were made in someone's basement. You can get better quality at your local big box store for $10-$15.
customer_reviews.author: PJMZ28

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, instructions are unclear
customer_reviews.text: These are very reasonably priced, and while they aren't an especially convincing wood texture when you look at them up close, they do look a lot classier than basic white plastic blinds. I ordered one to see how it looked and now that know they're alright I'm ordering more for some of the other windows in my house. I did knock off a star because the instructions are really annoyingly unclear and while mine are stable and working fine I'm still not sure I installed them exactly as intended. If you've never put up blinds before I'd recommend finding a tutorial on youtube or something, that's what I resorted to after the first 20 minutes of scratching my head.
customer_reviews.author: Evin H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but....
customer_reviews.text: I have installed tons of various blinds over the past years and these are probably the thinnest and lightest material I have come across with a 2 inch blind. With that said they LOOK nice and function well and I didn't expect any different at the price point. This is a quick and inexpensive way to really make a window with old 1 inch blinds look substantially better. Overall recommended!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it cost more.
customer_reviews.text: Has a rich look for a low end blind , the 2 inch slats make a diff as well. One problem is you just have to throw away the cheap as screws supplied and replace with some 6 x 1 wood screws . If you try to screw in the huge cheap screws provided they will round out before they seat and then they are hard to get out , plus if they DID screw all the way in they would hold a kid swinging from the blind. Don't know what the folks over there are thinking I would rather pay a quarter more and get decent screws included.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a lot for blinds because it was temporary and I wanted a wooded look of Venetian blinds. HOWEVER, These are really cute in my bathroom and I think I will keep them up. Super easy to install. Its bendable plastic not firm but has the grain texture look of wood.
customer_reviews.author: All In the Family

customer_reviews.title: Was able to cut to fit
customer_reviews.text: My window wasn't square so the top was off by about an 1/8 of an inch. I was able to cut the header bar with a hack saw to have a perfect fit. I was also able to trim the upper slats with heavy duty scissors so they would not bind on the frame. The only down side was it was a little lighter in color than what I thought it would be, but otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Brackets easily bent. Worse, the cross threads upon which the slats balance are not the same space apart on the left and right sides and one is missing about 1/3 of the way up from the bottom, so the loser part hangs unevenly, by about an inch. I rethreaded the lower part of one side and will lose the last slat length in order to make them even. The brackets that hold the bottom are a brittle plastic that probably won't hold up. I'm disappointed, but really kicking myself for forgetting one cardinal shopping rule -"you get what you pay for."
customer_reviews.author: hersheyzoe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t mount outside your window
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my front door. Looks nice for the money. Doesn’t seem super durable. Description says you can mount outside the window. It mounted fine, but the top of the unit is open so you can easily see inside from our 2nd-floor living room and the sides are not finished nicely. I wouldn’t recommend for outside-window mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Too short, arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: TOO SHORT. I assumed it was 35 inches because the box says 35 inches. It’s 34.5 inches. And it’s cracked. I bought 2 and one is all cracked up. I already installed the brackets. The regular plastic blinds seem sturdier. The old blinds were probably 20 years old.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulD

customer_reviews.title: broken after 11 months use
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! mechanism for raising/lowering broken after less than one year!!! Intermittent use only. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: daneabo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These blinds are super flimsy! I expected a decent girth in the panels and they were paper thin. Strangely I ordered similar blinds of a different dimension and they were as expected. Very strange.
customer_reviews.author: PrimePro

customer_reviews.title: Open you box right away, might be missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Opened package and was missing mounting brackets and hardware. Top cover also broken. By the time I got around to putting these up the return window had closed. (No pun intended!)
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Blinds installed fine and look fine at a glance. However, if I had it to do over again, I would stick with Walmart Better Homes brand. Almost exactly the same price but the Walmart blinds are much thicker and sturdier. I would say each slat is about 3x thicker than these. I hope these hold up ok.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and thick blinds. They're white. I like the smooth finish unlike others I I baught that had a wood grain look and were off white. They lift with your hand no pull cord.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Look of Real Wood, Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a old home, and wanted a classic look. These were excellent. They look like wood, but have the sturdy and lightweight appeal of vinyl. I installed them in 3 minutes, and they work very well and look fantastic! Amazing deal for the price and I will certainly buy more!
customer_reviews.author: LeRub

customer_reviews.title: Accessorized to stay in place for child safety
customer_reviews.text: Good imitation of wood without the high cost. The accessories are very handy with small children around and for keeping the blinds in place at the base of the window. Have gotten compliments from friends and family. Here are some pics of the blinds open and closed.
customer_reviews.author: Deeangel008

customer_reviews.title: Sun faded the color
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied when I first received my order. Fast shipping, looked pretty good, nice price compared to the real deal and easy to install. BUT, after a few months the sun had faded the color. It's past my time for return, so my money is lost. note: I had these in my bedroom window, only receives about 5 hrs of sun during the evening, so yeah, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just love these blinds. They look and act like top dollar blinds but for a fraction of the price. Very easy to install. I'm sure I'll be buying more eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe You Want Curtains
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my problem with these blinds is more common sense than I would've though, but since they are 2 inches thick, so is the top of the blinds that needs to be installed. So make sure to measure the depth of your window frame leading to the window, otherwise installation will be difficult and the product will stick out of the frame. They also hung crooked. I ended up returning the blinds I had and opting for curtains instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great look for great price!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to replace some old blinds in a rental property, but didn't want to spend a fortune on wood blinds. These are a perfect compromise--great price that still provides a nice look for the windows. The two inch design was just what I wanted to find and the vinyl seems to be sturdy--and less noisy than aluminum blinds. Installation was easy and quick. Definitely will buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: KDawgTeach

customer_reviews.title: First time installing blinds in my life
customer_reviews.text: The color is really good and it looks really durable for the price. Installation was fairly simple, considering that it was my first time doing it. I did have to look up a few YouTube videos on how to install blinds correctly but ultimately, I'm happy with this purchase!! (if you are a first-timer like me, expect to spend at least 1~2 hours installing it)
customer_reviews.author: T.B

customer_reviews.title: For $18 I didn't expect them to look so nice or be built so well
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality. For $18 I didn't expect them to look so nice or be built so well. My only issue was something that may be only because of this old house. The top bracket is a bit wider than the window depth, so they stick out about 1/2". But not a deal breaker. They look good and block a lot of the sunlight when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Life in NE WA State

customer_reviews.title: Simple install and worth it at this price
customer_reviews.text: Great. I will eventually get more, when they restock? The blinds are flexible - like the original white plastic blinds. They blend in with my prior harder faux wood ones w/no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. Says they bend and go back to place. I got these specifically for this as with my dogs and kid always in the windows i needed something durable. Well this is not. One bend back to lool outside and it was ripped right off.
customer_reviews.author: BRIZZDOWN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice blinds. They're sturdy. The only problem I had was that they sent both right sided end caps. Left side at top of blinds is exposed. Lucky my curtain valance will hide it.
customer_reviews.author: KimK

customer_reviews.title: One's great, one's broken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these - one is perfect and works beautifully, the other has a broken slat at the top and doesn't open and close the way it's supposed to. I'm going to have to buy another set, because I am NOT going to take those @#$!! brackets down, return them, and then put up new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kryptonite451

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for blackout shades, there’s a lot of light leaks.
customer_reviews.text: They look really nice, I love the color, and from outside they look very classy. These are very nice shades, but there’s a lot of light leak not just in the sides where the holes are that the lines run through, but also in between the blinds themselves as if they don’t close all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Coffaro

customer_reviews.title: The quality seemed fine, the color I "thought" I was getting was ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality seemed fine, the color I "thought" I was getting was nothing like what actually came. If I had any advice it would be don't order the light wood color it looks like a mustard yellow in person (yuck) I returned them but it cost me almost $12 to do so, which means I basically lost that money off of what my refund would have been :( Very unhappy about that!! The color clearly looks like an oak color in the description not dark yellow, even though I knew I was ordering a vinyl type material, the color should not have been so different as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sandys chicken coop

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT FIT WINDOW
customer_reviews.text: The size was not as stated. It was a 1/2" longer. That made it too long to fit in the window. These blinds come in conventional sizes. Don't know where the windows are made that fit this blind. No in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D Young

customer_reviews.title: Directions were terrible unless you know what the term off ladder means
customer_reviews.text: Directions were terrible unless you know what the term off ladder means. Had to mount support bracket 3 time to get it correct (off ladder). Once I had the blind installed and lowered the blind I noticed that top louver was cracked and will only turn correctly in one direction. I will keep this blind only because I don't want to uninstall the complete thing and have to package it back up.
customer_reviews.author: William J Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super well made.
customer_reviews.text: Watched the video and it was as easy as described.
customer_reviews.author: NUSHOES

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Not really applicable for living areas. I used this one for the craft room window.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Width not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: they look good but I think I prefer the mini blind. I probably would’ve kept them except for the width is not correct they were not 32 they were 31+. I really need it 32 1/2. So less than 32 did not give me enough coverage .
customer_reviews.author: SY

customer_reviews.title: These are easy to install and look nice
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and look nice. I'm not a huge fan of blinds, but I actually like these. I will buy more in the future. I am unhappy though that they capped me out at 4 on my order when I needed 5. I had to work around that and have someone else order for me as well.
customer_reviews.author: care

customer_reviews.title: You'll love these. I sooooo do.
customer_reviews.text: Love these blinds. Keeps the light out when you want it pout. Brings it back in when you want it in and it's pretty fancy. I think of all my neighbors on the block my window looks jazzy and not standard. Thanks to Ross the curtains brought out my window with a splash of style tooooooo.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! Ordered them again and this time they came cordless. Love this one even more!
customer_reviews.author: Dedra M.

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Yah! I received my blinds with all brackets and hardware included in box! They are wonderful and easy to put up. Very well made for the price. Last one ordered I had a hard time to get the hardware and brackets that were missing in the box. After a little bit of run around I received credit for it and reordered the shade and am very pleased with it.I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Looks good so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought to of these for my living room windows. I haven't installed them yet, but it looks pretty easy. For the price, it is a great bargain. I would recommend this product to all. Just be sure of your width measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Warmsley III

customer_reviews.title: My son bought these blinds and they look nice. I decided to try one room to see ...
customer_reviews.text: My son bought these blinds and they look nice. I decided to try one room to see if they work for us. We have not installed them yet but will shortly. They should be fine for guest bedrooms and garage windows. Large and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Walkie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice from across the room, however, it is constructed of pretty flimsy plastic. The blinds are made of very thin gauge material, maybe 3/64th thick. I can imagine that if they were in direct sunlight for a long time, they may become brittle. We will see!
customer_reviews.author: insideoriginal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Nice looking blinds but they fade so quickly on the window side. I do always keep the blinds closed so this may have something to do with it as well. For the price I would probably buy these again compared to the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: amandab

customer_reviews.title: Look as great as blinds can
customer_reviews.text: Used in bathroom to add contrast. Color was consistent throughout, mechanically work fine. I shorted them to 1/2 length through use of youtube video instructions and they still work!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: so good. Even though these are plastic like regular blinds
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Even though these are plastic like regular blinds, they look so nice! My cats have been unsuccessful in tearing them up, so we’ll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cutchens

customer_reviews.title: bottom of blind don't stay level it tilts ether in or out not the same as rest of the slats
customer_reviews.text: easy to install but bottom of blind don't stay level it tilts ether in or out not the same as rest of the slats
customer_reviews.author: Leon Bomberger

customer_reviews.title: damages. need to check before ship
customer_reviews.text: came with a broken extra. what do i need that for? has some slight black on some leafs. i bought 9 for my entire house.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael B

customer_reviews.title: We really like these so far
customer_reviews.text: We really like these so far. We have had two up since September 2018 and have had no trouble with them at all. They are easy to raise and lower and filter the light well. They are not room darkening but still keep out a lot of the light on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: East TN Girl

customer_reviews.title: They are blinds
customer_reviews.text: These are blinds. They do as they are supposed to. Keep out the sun. Install took me about 10 minutes. Very simple and straight forward as long as you have common sense. Product came packaged and undamaged. They go great in our bedroom and match our oak bed frame. Again, they are blinds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the money , came complete with instructions and all hardware . They work smoothly and seem rugged , mounting is simple . Put up 3 in 1/2 hour . The color is a bit weird but I used them in my workout room so that doesn't matter that much . I see some complaints here but my experience was that they went up easily work well , if you want perfection pay 4 times more for the Levelors .
customer_reviews.author: motahead

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cordless design, wish I find this earlier so I can replace all my blind to this type.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if your blinds need to stay closed
customer_reviews.text: I guess should have read the details better, I didn't realize that these were thin plastic. I got over that though, overall they look nice... until you try to open them and one side always sags. No matter what I do, one side will not stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Nic B

customer_reviews.title: Need replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: Bought three sets of blinds. One box had a cracked valence too cover , one box was completely missing the rod to turn the blinds. Need to know how to get this problem addressed.
customer_reviews.author: britt harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good blind for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. All the needed hardware plus extra was included. Instructions were easy to follow. Does not block out all the light but it does a good job of darkening the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: So far they look great! I hope it stays that way for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The blinds are terible quality compared to others we have purchased for close to the same amount. They were scratched and bent and are too thin to keep light out. We had to return them as they are damaged too.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These are the best blinds!!! I have had them for 5 years and i want to buy more, i highly recommend these! Gorgeous and look like real wood also super easy to clean . Wish these were available to buy again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherbear7

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality.  Not flat slats.  These are curved.
customer_reviews.text: Good blinds. However, the pictures and description is not clear. They are vinyl, but they are not flat. We thought these were 2" flat vinyl blinds. They are curved and not as thick as what we were expecting. We returned these, but if you are looking for the curved blinds, these would be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aprime

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who just bought here first home. Very good quality and easy installation. Shipping packaging very sturdy, blinds arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jim-N-Texas

customer_reviews.title: These are STRIPED!
customer_reviews.text: These do not have a natural gradient of dark and light colors but instead have huge blocks of dark and huge blocks of light. They are essentially striped with each block consisting of about 7-8 blinds in one color and the next 7 or 8 being the other color. It's not cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jr and Alex Mom

customer_reviews.title: Comparable product
customer_reviews.text: We haven't hung them up yet but we pulled them out of the box to make sure we didn't need to return them. The quality is comparable to what they sell in home depot or lowes. The color was nice and we will be ordering several more to put in all of our windows.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: It was nice that these blinds came in the size that I ...
customer_reviews.text: It was nice that these blinds came in the size that I need, but the quality is far inferior to that of the Bali blinds that I bought for the other windows. These are not horrible, but they're not nice. Go with the Bali blinds if they fit your windows; they are less expensive and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: MissMissy

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, I was looking for white wood blinds. The item described it a woodgrain look and it clearly is plain white venetian blinds that I could have gotten from Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The blinds are no better than cheep white plastic blinds. It’s very thin plastic. Also came missing all hardware and the wand that spins to make them open and shut.😡
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin. They are 2 inch wide but as thin as regular blinds
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had very expensive wood like vinyl blinds in my boys room. They destroyed the blinds by fooling around. I wasn't going to pay for another set of expensive blinds. these blinds are perfect. Yes, they are thin and bendable but for the price, I don't know what some people expect! really thick blinds are $75 a pair and up (for my size windows). The wood tone is very nice and as I said, for the price, you can't go wrong! The blinds fir perfectly an d they all matched in tone (someone said theirs didn't!) and, delivery was extremely prompt!
customer_reviews.author: J1953

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty blinds to help you become a hermit
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to install and they block light very effectively. I bought 4 of these for my computer room and they do the job well. They are quite heavy, however, and I fear that something may break when I lift them up, but they seem to hold well.
customer_reviews.author: CMarq

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely great! Unfortunately they are too big for my windows ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely great! Unfortunately they are too big for my windows so I will have to return them, but I am planning on trying the next size down. Provided I don't have to spend too much to send them back. Very very appealing looking product. Highly recommend them - just make sure you measure right!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks for value
customer_reviews.text: Installed in under 5 minutes. There blinds.. I mean there isn't much to it. I immediately used my own longer screws. The ones included may have worked but I had longer ones handy so I just did it that way. They raise and lower smooth. They're blinds that cost 15 bucks. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thinks

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds for the price if your just looking to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great blinds for the price if your just looking to put up something for privacy. Fairly easy to install & the look pretty good. The only problem is if your putting up more than one next to each other, you will definitely need sunlight blocking curtains because the space in between & the holes for the strings let in a decent amount of light...
customer_reviews.author: W. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: For some reason i thought this would be more like a thin cardboard or thin plastic with some texture
customer_reviews.text: For some reason i thought this would be more like a thin cardboard or thin plastic with some texture...but this is more like aluminum. It doesn't look like the picture. Its not bad. Just expecting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These look gorgeous. You'd really have to study them to notice that they're not real wood. They were easy to install. They're not quite as sturdy as I would have hoped for. My dog broke a few of the slats, but he's a big boy, so I don't blame the manufacturer. I've yet to find something this dog can't destroy!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: No more twirling the stick
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Seems to cover better than other blinds. My other blinds which were just the small slats used to have some light reflected off of the walls coming through but these do not. I also like the larger slats in the blinds. The think I really like is no more twirling the stick to get them to open or close.
customer_reviews.author: T. Longmire

customer_reviews.title: and it looks amazing against my tan walls throughout my home
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered these just for my living room. I have now ordered these for the rest of my home, and it looks amazing against my tan walls throughout my home, and even looks nice against my turquoise and magenta walls in the master suite.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck and the 2" looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Blinds are great - ordered multiple in various sizes. One of the blind was damaged although the box didn't show excessive wear, half of the blade had broken. Replacement was easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Marinara

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE PRODUCT ASAP WHEN IT ARRIVES...MINE WAS BROKEN!
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed in this blind. Unfortunately was not able to return it due to the deadline. My husband finally went to install this blind and there were all kinds of broken blind pieces in the box. Turns out many of the individual blinds on this were broken off at the corner. It is completely un-useable. Would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find. The color the size. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: milleeran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look great for the price and were easy to hang! Very satisfied and will be buying more soon!
customer_reviews.author: JustSomePhoneGuy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the slats would be thicker, but they do what they were meant to do, block out light and look good doing it. Very easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Average blind
customer_reviews.text: The photo looks better than the actual product. The blind looks and feels cheaper that the photo would have you believe. But hey, it didn't cost much. It depends on where you want to use it. I put this blind into a rarely used room, ergo, it's cheap look doesn't bother me much. All hardware was included and handy man had no trouble installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi L. Ifft

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for price.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a great amount of timing to Southern California. PERFECT for Price, Great color, seems durable enough for my apartment. Ordered two and they both are allI could ask for my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: QW

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love These! Fit my bathroom window perfectly and was exactly as pictured on Amazon. Easy to install and even the color was exact. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: M in Maui

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, much better quality than those cheap little thin blinds you see everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A

customer_reviews.title: however they don't look bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about this blind, considering the price and material. The blind are made of plastic, however they don't look bad at all, actually I was very surprised after that I installed the blind in my window. Some pieces don't fit, actually you will need to bend some holders to grab the main frame in the wall. Anyway, I managed to install it in my window without much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The blinds themselves are great, look nice & sturdy, but if you're looking for accurate sizing, they're not. I got two of the 35in wide blinds, put them next to each other, one was wider than the other by 3/4in-1in. Noticable difference, I was pretty bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Triston M. Winterich

customer_reviews.title: Great blinds
customer_reviews.text: Love these blinds! They're great for darkening which we needed badly. And they look great and expensive. Would definitely buy again if I ever need more.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive blinds
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my bathroom and I love them. They definitely look nice considering how inexpensive they were. In fact I like them so much I ordered more. I definitely did not experience what I read in some of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: The slats are very thin and flimsy. Multiple have already broke after less than 3 months. These let in quite a bit more light than other brand I have throughout my home. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: ... few in the past and realized how much I like them and purchased more
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a few in the past and realized how much I like them and purchased more. they are durable. they don't collect dust but are easy to clean. allows sunshine in and keeps sunshine out if you prefer. just all around great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Neemah

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Blind
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase and I well buy more as I replace my blinds. Price was very reasonable I think!
customer_reviews.author: NANZ

customer_reviews.title: ... grams den and put these in ther they are great at blockin to much light and look great she ...
customer_reviews.text: remodeled my grams den and put these in ther they are great at blockin to much light and look great she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: These blinds came super fast and safe
customer_reviews.text: These blinds came super fast and safe. They look great and installed pretty easily. They are built tough and will even hold up to a beagle jumping at the door to kill the mailman! Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: I gave a 3 star because they still have a nice appeal when closed
customer_reviews.text: Blinds are thinner than pictured. I gave a 3 star because they still have a nice appeal when closed. Once opened though, it highlights how things the blind blades are. Still can't beat them for the price. Does block a lot of light when closed and sized properly for the window openig.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W

product_meta.title: Achim Home Furnishings Luna 2-Inch Vinyl Blind, 29 by 64-Inch, Mahogany
product_meta.description: Style Name:Corded| Color:Mahogany| Size:29" x 64"The Luna plantation blinds feature 2 in. vinyl slats with matching 2 in. valance. These blinds offer a fresh and dramatic look to any room. The embossed slats are rich and vibrant and have a luxurious woodgrain appearance. These Plantation blinds are ideal for any room in your home including the kitchen, bath, basement or garage. They would also look great in your office.
feature_bullets: Mount inside or outside window frame
Will Not Chip, Dent, Or Fade
Most popular custom blind made very affordable
Actual item dimensions are 1/2" smaller than listed size to fit in the window frame

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,341 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
